summary: This Skyrim mod installs the DCR Heavy Weapons set. The DCR mods for Skyrim are a continuation of the original Dark Crusader content from Oblivion.
descriptionHtml:
[center] [img] http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1566738-1335232582.png [/img] [/center]


[color=orange] [Short Description] [/color]
This Skyrim mod installs the DCR - Heavy Weapons Set. The DCR mods for Skyrim are a continuation of the original Dark Crusader content from Oblivion.

[color=orange] [What this mod contains] [/color]
-Demon Crusher Mace: Two hand War Hammer.
-Avenger Axe: Two hand Battleaxe.
-New Enchant: Breath Of Righteousness, more info in screen shots. Enchant activates at 50% or less health, and requires a power attack.
-Introductory quest: DCR - Forging Ahead

[color=orange] [Where To Start] [/color]
First head to [color=green] Falkreath [/color], a far southern town in Skyrim. Once there, head to the [color=green] Gray Pine Goods [/color] store and talk to Solaf. He now sells a book called “The Last Gate of Cyrodiil.” Buying this book starts the quest DCR – Forging Ahead. If you’re not interested in lore or story-lines, don’t worry the quest is pretty quick.

The reason for the quest is to fill in what happened to the Dark Crusaders after the Oblivion crisis 200 years ago. It also sets the stage for the rest of the DCR series yet to come.

[color=orange] [Other DCR Mods] [/color]
Dark Crusader Reforged is a mod series that recreates everything from the original Oblivion mod, plus items that never made it in. Below is a list in no specific order of items yet to be made. Items in blue are either done, or in beta stages.

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4330] -DCR - Shadow Buckler [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5284] -DCR - Blade Set [/url]
-Shadow Defender Armor (in progress)
-DCR Longbow
